title: Feb 21, 2026
summary: Big Move Convexity: autonomous 0DTE options trading pipeline with real-time Polygon WebSocket data, ML signal generation, and dashboard monitoring.

features.title: Big Move Convexity Strategy
features.summary: New autonomous 0DTE options entry strategy powered by LightGBM ensemble signal from Phase 2 research.
features.description:
A new ExecutionStrategy that runs inside the IB agent's 100ms eval loop. Every 5 minutes during the scan window (13:30-15:55 ET), it assembles a 50+ feature vector from real-time bars, computes a volatility prediction via the trained LightGBM model, and generates entry signals for 20bp OTM 0DTE SPY options.

Key parameters are hot-reloadable via the dashboard: signal threshold, cooldown, direction mode, max contracts, contract budget, scan window, and auto-entry toggle. Auto-entry defaults to OFF for safety.

On fill, the strategy spawns a RiskManagerStrategy with the new 'zero_dte_convexity' preset: no stop loss (hold losers to expiry), trailing stop at 25% below peak (activates at +50%), and tiered profit-taking at 2x/4x/6x/11x.

features.title: Real-Time Polygon WebSocket + Bar Construction
features.summary: Live tick data from Polygon WebSocket feeds real-time 5s/15s/1m OHLCV bars for feature computation.
features.description:
Two new modules in the research repo: PolygonWSClient handles WebSocket connection management (auth, subscribe, reconnect with exponential backoff) on top of the existing PolygonWebSocketProvider message parser. BarAccumulator converts individual trade and quote ticks into multi-resolution OHLCV bars (5s, 15s, 1m) with thread-safe accumulation.

The strategy runs the Polygon WS in a background thread, feeding ticks to BarAccumulator which emits completed bars to LiveDataStore. Supports both delayed (free tier, 15-min lag) and live (paid tier) Polygon feeds.

features.title: Signals Dashboard Tab
features.summary: New 'Signals' tab on the Options page shows real-time BMC signal state, positions, and configurable parameters.
features.description:
A new fourth tab on the M&A Options page provides full transparency into the autonomous trading pipeline:

- Status bar: Polygon WS connection state, bars accumulated, last decision time
- Signal panel: Current probability, direction, strength (color-coded green/red/gray)
- Position monitor: Active BMC positions with entry price, current P&L, risk manager state
- Config panel: Editable threshold, cooldown, auto-entry toggle, scan window, max contracts
- Override buttons: Pause/Resume scanning, Force Close All, Manual Entry
- Signal history: Last 20 signals with timestamps and outcomes

Polls the agent every 2 seconds (skips when tab is backgrounded).

features.title: Zero-DTE Convexity Risk Preset
features.summary: New risk management preset optimized for 0DTE options: hold losers, trail winners at 25%.
features.description:
Research found that 79% of winning 0DTE trades retrace at least 50% from peak, and trailing at 25% adds +243pp to profit factor vs hold-to-expiry. The new 'zero_dte_convexity' preset implements this:

- No stop loss (fees eat remaining value on losers)
- Trailing stop: activates at +50%, trails at 25% below peak
- Profit targets: bank 15% at 2x, 20% at 4x, 25% at 6x, 50% at 11x
- Market orders for speed on 0DTE exits
